'''Taterstone stairs''' are a [[taterstone]] variant of the [[stairs]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|Taterstone Stairs|Hoe|Wood|horizontal=1|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Taterstone stairs generate naturally in [[potato village]]s and [[ruined portatol]]s.
